title: Understanding HLOOKUP
text: The HLOOKUP function is used to search for a value in the top row of a table or array and return a value in the same column from a row you specify.

title: Direction of Lookup
text: Consider the direction in which the data is organized in the table. Is it horizontal or vertical?

hintAnswer: looking up a table direction for a field of data that is horizontal, or across the worksheet
title: Horizontal Lookup
text: If the data is organized horizontally, which function would you use?
choices: looking up a table direction for a field of data that is horizontal, or across the worksheet
looking up a table when the direction is vertical, or down the worksheet
